user_query: I'm organizing a company retreat in London and I want to incorporate team-building activities. Can you recommend some popular locations for team-building exercises? It would also be helpful if you could fetch the contact details of professional team-building facilitators from Instagram so I can hire them for the retreat. Additionally, suggest some luxury hotels in London where our employees can stay during the retreat.

TaskList.description: Research and list popular locations in London for team-building exercises.
Fetch contact details of professional team-building facilitators from Instagram.
Search for luxury hotels in London suitable for corporate retreats.
